committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to extend the pilot program for alternative water source projects.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control
Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to increase from $75 to $125 million the amount of authorized appropriations for the pilot program for alternative water source projects.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to extend the pilot program for alternative water source projects.
